after finishing my career i discovered that i m not that pasionate about it.

participant_2.background:
I am a creative person who uses art to process my emotions.
i do not treat my girlfriend very well.
i am a girl who loves sports cars and video games.
i am in a local theater company.
I'll start my day by responding to messages from potential dates.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Good! I'm actually in a theater company and we are getting ready for our next performance.
Oh that's awesome! What kind of theater company is it?
It's a local theater company that puts on a variety of shows. We have a lot of fun with it.
That sounds like a lot of fun! What is your favorite thing to do with your free time?
I love to paint and draw. I find it to be a very therapeutic way to express myself.
That's so cool! I wish I could draw. I'm always amazed by people who can create such beautiful art.
Thanks! It's something I've always been passionate about.
I'm glad you have something that you love to do.
Me too! It's important to have something that you can do to relax and de-stress.
So what do you do for work?
I'm a paper salesman. It's not the most exciting job in the world, but it pays the bills.
I'm sure it's not as bad as you think!
It's not bad. But I definitely prefer my time in the theater.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of interests. That's good!
